assistant_greeting: Hello! üëã I'm the virtual assistant of the dealership. Is your inquiry about sales, service, after-sales, or general info?
conversation_example: 1. Greeting and assistant introduction. 2. Detects intent: sales, service, after-sales, general info, or moderation. 3. Responds or requests data based on category. 4. Rates the lead (sales, service, after-sales, informative). 5. Escalates to an advisor if necessary. 6. Fallback if it doesn't understand. 7. Closing by offering further assistance.
qa_q_placeholder: How much does the new 0km model cost?
qa_a_placeholder: The price depends on the model and version. I can help you get a quote and see financing options. What car interests you so I can give you the updated price?
question: Question
reply_only_related: Reply only to queries related to‚Ä¶

complete_required_data: Complete the required data before continuing
missing_campaign_step1: Campaign must be created in Step 1
knowledge_what: It will be used to auto-generate questions and answers.
complete_campaign_data: Complete the base data of your campaign
brief_objectives_summary: We are the Toyota dealership and through this channel we provide you with quick support: we answer basic questions about models, prices, financing and availability. We also moderate messages to maintain clear and safe communication, filtering spam and inappropriate content.
what_is_valid_lead: A valid lead is a potential customer who has expressed genuine interest in our products or services, providing accurate contact information and relevant details that allow us to follow up effectively. Valid leads are those who fit our target audience criteria and have the intention to make a purchase or engage further with our offerings.
reduce_spam_example: The purpose of moderation is to ensure a safe and professional environment for users. Insults, spam, fraud, and irrelevant messages are filtered out, organizing genuine inquiries and ensuring clear and prompt responses. This protects the brand's reputation and enhances the customer experience.
select_channels: Select one or more channels for this campaign
instagram_desc: DMs and comments on posts and stories
appointments_config: Define calendars per professional, active days and available hours
appointments_warning: Enable to configure service calendars. If disabled, they won't show in your assistant
appointments_off: Disabled. Turn on the switch to configure calendars.
no_calendars: There are no calendars yet. Create the first one with "New calendar".
who_and_how: Who we talk to and how
new_prefer: ‚Äî If you prefer, you can clear everything and start a new one
ia_gets_you: The AI that understands you and builds with you
ia_gets_sub: Chat with the platform, define your objectives and let artificial intelligence configure the rest: surveys, virtual assistants and strategies ready to launch.
messages2: How can I help you today?
messages3: I want to create a campaign
messages4: Let me tell you about my company

setup_channel_accounts: Set up accounts for these channels to enable moderation:

ready_channels: These channels are already connected and ready to receive/send messages.
now_on: From now on, this campaign will be able to receive and send messages through this WhatsApp number.

webchat_domain_help: Enter the domain of the website where you plan to implement the webchat. This helps ensure proper configuration and functionality.
stats_no_leads_yet: No leads yet to display statistics.
target_audience_example: The assistant is aimed at people interested in buying a car, customers needing service appointments or post-sale support, and users seeking quick information about models, prices, location, and dealership services.
